title: Blonde with a Wand
description: View our feature on Vicki Lewis Thompsonâ€™s Blonde with a Wand.From the Wild & Hexy imagination of a New York Times bestselling author   Sexy witch Anica Revere has one rule: never under any circumstances get involved with a man before telling him she's a witch. Still, what's one silly rule? Especially when the guy in question is as cute as Jasper Danes. But when Anica and Jasper have a spat, she breaks an ever bigger rule of witchcraft and turns him into a cat. Bad news for him. Worse for her...
author: Vicki Lewis Thompson
